content: This API allows users to upload a document to the system. The document will be stored under the user's account and can be later attached to sessions.

rows: The unique identifier of the user.
The unique identifier of the document.
The actual content of the document.

content: The API returns a JSON object containing details of the uploaded document.

{
  "doc_id": "123",
  "user_id": "abc",
  "name": "My Document",
  "description": "Sample document description",
  "content": "This is the content of the document."
}
If a document with the same `doc_id` already exists, the API will return an error.
